articles.title: Nintendo Is Ending 3DS & Wii U eShop Purchases In March 2023 (North America) - Nintendo Life
articles.content:
Image: Nintendo Life
Nintendo has announced the discontinuation of the 3DS and Wii U eShop in North America as of "late" March 2023.
While you'll still be able to redownload games and DLC, receive … [+2842 chars]
